description: Norway is depicted as a recluse and is revealed to be the brother of Iceland following a DNA test. He is shown to be the only nation other than England to be able to see spirits and magical creatures. We also know that Norway is a magician. He is very annoyed by Denmark and often overreacts to him, even choking him once, although he is described as having a special relationship with the Dane. He is protective of Iceland and is shown to care a lot about him.
name: Norway
